sections.heading: of execution; expiration; writ to issue; duty of clerk
sections.text: At the expiration of the stay the clerk shall issue a joint execution against the property of all the judgment debtors and sureties, describing them as debtors or sureties therein.SourceLaws 1875, ยง 9, p. 51;R.S.1913, ยง 8054;C.S.1922, ยง 8995;C.S
